about_the_game:
My Littlest Skeleton is a cosy and relaxing simulation where you care for your very own little Skeleton chum!

Pull your unique Skeleton back from the depths of the Nether Region. Attend to their needs, maintain their crypt furnishings, and choose from a variety of environments for your Skeleton to call home.

The happier your Skeleton becomes, the greater the rewards! So make sure you take good care of them, because, after all, there is a Skeleton in all of us!

Features

  • Customise your Skeletons' Identity to make them uniquely yours!
  • Maintain your Skeletons needs by giving them the furnishings they need
  • Maintain the upkeep of your Skeleton's surroundings and environment, they are quite clumsy after all.
  • Choose from a number of environments for your Skeleton to live in!
